headline: Newmont Corporation (NEM) Outpaces Stock Market Gains: What You Should Know
summary: Newmont Corporation (NEM) concluded the recent trading session at $88.4, signifying a +1.67% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Gold Just Hit $4,000. Mining Stocks Look Like the Best Way to Play It.
summary: Gold and other precious metals are glittering—and mining stocks are shining even brighter.  The  exchange-traded fund has climbed more than 130% in 2025, compared with a nearly 55% surge in the price of gold.  Newmont  a recent Barron’s stock pick, has jumped more than 135%.

headline: Has Newmont’s Rally Priced In Cost Cuts and Strong Gold Earnings for 2025?
summary: If you are weighing what to do with your Newmont shares, or contemplating a new investment, you are in good company. The gold mining giant has caught eyes lately for more than just market glitter. Over the past month alone, Newmont’s stock has jumped 14.2%, and since the start of the year, the stock has soared an astonishing 126.6%. It’s hard not to notice these moves, especially when the one-year return stands at 68.2%. These numbers are not moving in a vacuum. Recent headlines have...

headline: Gold To Pass LNG As Australia’s No. 2 Resource Export
summary: On Tuesday, Australia said it expects gold to become the country’s second most valuable resource after iron ore this financial year, eclipsing liquefied natural gas (LNG), which has struggled due to lower oil prices.
